item.title: Show HN：Vibe编码iOS应用程序从想法到发布，这就是我所学的
item.description:
只需使用Vibe编码发布此应用程序，我花了2周的时间才能在商店中释放，1周才能建造1周，以修复3个Apple评论拒绝。这是我学到的： 1，我没有编写一行代码，光标+xcode处理90％的工作，但我仍然需要自己解决一些奇怪的问题和错误。 2，您不需要在App Cuppery中购买app receNuecat或apapty in App购买，苹果的新商店kit2我的kit2 kit2均不包括服务器侧收据的所有效果，这些都不会使您的cocopods f aster cocoodods for> each new features AI added, so remember to use many git push and branches to save work4, Building the app is easy now, but the harder part is marketing and how to grow it into real business, which I am still learning5, I got the app name from AI, even the main ICON is generated by AI, but I did spent $240 on upwork for App Store marketing design6, sometime the cursor can't fix a compiler issue, I copy paste changpt的代码进行第二意见。这是应用链接，请随时查看： https://apps.apple.com/us/us/pinmapp/pinmapper/id6752612645
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45406580 点：1 ＃评论：0
